```{r mbtoken, echo=FALSE}
MAPBOX_TOKEN <- "pk.eyJ1IjoiZHVycmFuaXUiLCJhIjoiY2p0Z21lazZqMDBjODQ5b2RrOXFwcHI5ZCJ9._DooiSrHiPv1bWhnTdMI1Q"
```



```{r gtr}
library(g3r)

# grand canyon
g3r(lat = 36.2058, lon = -112.4413, alpha = TRUE, mapbox_token = MAPBOX_TOKEN) %>% g3r_camera(.5,.5,1)
```
